Here are some install instructions that worked for me with  The_Walking_Dead_Episodes_1_2_and_3_PC_Game___nosTEAM__
- copy/paste the walking_dead_104 folder into your install Pack folder
- (re)install the game (the_walking_dead.exe in the parent directory), otherwise episode not detected
- now the episode should be playable (if the game as a whole works objviously)
Hope this helps and thx uploader (not so boobish by the look of your account)
